channel.title: 1. Setup Prerequisites on KCD Cloud Native
channel.description: Recent content in 1. Setup Prerequisites on KCD Cloud Native

item.title: 1. Install WSL and Linux
item.description: Windows Subsystem for Linux (WSL) You must be running Windows 10 version 2004 and higher (Build 19041 and higher) or Windows 11. We highly recommend you to go to the WSL Installation to get started with WSL environment. The Windows Subsystem for Linux lets developers run a GNU/Linux environment directly on Windows, unmodified, without the overhead of a traditional virtual machine or dualboot setup. Install Windows Subsytem for Linux (WSL) ➡️ Powershell/CMD
